channel.title: YOJNA PORTAL 2025 - Govt Schemes & Sarkari Job Updates Daily
channel.description: Recent content on YOJNA PORTAL 2025 - Govt Schemes & Sarkari Job Updates Daily

item.title: HPSC Assistant Professor Result 2025
item.description: The Haryana Public Service Commission (HPSC) has declared the final result for Assistant Professor Recruitment 2025 on July 11. A total of 2,424 vacancies across multiple subjects have been filled. Candidates can now check their roll numbers in the final selection list PDF available on the official website hpsc.gov.in. The recruitment included a written test and document verification process.

item.title: MP Guest Teacher (Atithi Shikshak) Choice Filling 2025-26
MPESB Primary School Teacher Selection Test 2025 Online Form
item.description: Madhya Pradesh Employees Selection Board (MPESB) has released the notification for the Primary School Teacher Selection Test 2025. A total of 10,150 Varg 3 Primary Teacher posts will be recruited under the School Education Department. Eligible candidates who have qualified the MP Primary TET 2020 or 2024 can apply online. Applicants must check the detailed eligibility, age limit, and other conditions in the official notification before applying. Candidates from outside MP can also apply but will not get any domicile reservation or relaxation benefits.

item.title: Jharkhand SSC ANM Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Jharkhand Staff Selection Commission (JSSC) has released the official notification for the recruitment of Female Health Workers (A.N.M.) under the Regular and Backlog vacancies for the year 2025. A total of 3,181 posts are available, including 3,020 regular and 161 backlog vacancies. Only female candidates who are domicile of Jharkhand and have completed 10th (Matric) with at least 45% marks, along with 18 months A.N.M. training and registration in Jharkhand State Nursing Council, are eligible to apply. The application process will be conducted online through the official JSSC website. Interested and eligible candidates must read the official notification thoroughly and apply within the specified dates.

item.title: MPESB Candidate Profiling / Profile Panjiyan Form Online
item.description: To apply for any government recruitment under the Madhya Pradesh Employees Selection Board (MPESB), all candidates must complete the Candidate Profile Registration process. This is a one-time mandatory step where applicants register using Aadhaar eKYC, upload personal and academic details, and receive a unique Profile ID. This ID is required for all future MPESB applications. The process is simple, online, and essential for anyone seeking government jobs in Madhya Pradesh.

item.title: RBI Officers Grade A & B Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has announced 28 vacancies for various Grade A and B Officer posts under the 2025 recruitment drive. The available posts include Law Officer, Manager (Technical ‚Äì Civil and Electrical), Assistant Manager (Rajbhasha), and Assistant Manager (Protocol & Security). Candidates applying for these positions must meet the minimum educational qualifications such as LLB, BE/B.Tech, Master‚Äôs Degree, or have military experience, along with relevant work experience where required. This is a great opportunity for eligible candidates to join the RBI as an officer and contribute to the nation‚Äôs central banking system. Interested applicants can submit their applications through the official RBI website within the given deadline.

item.title: RRB Assistant Loco Pilot ALP CBAT Admitcard 2025
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has released the Exam City Intimation Slip for the Assistant Loco Pilot (ALP) CBAT 2025. Candidates can now check their allotted exam city and centre details through the official RRB regional websites. This information helps applicants plan their travel and exam preparations accordingly.

item.title: NHPC Apprentice Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: NHPC Limited has announced 361 Apprentice vacancies for the year 2025 under Graduate, Diploma, and ITI categories. Candidates from Engineering, Commerce, Management, Law, and Technical trades can apply. The application process begins on 11 July 2025 and ends on 11 August 2025. This is a one-year apprenticeship program and selections will be based on academic merit. No written test or interview will be conducted.

item.title: Indian Airforce Agniveervayu Intake 02/2026 Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Indian Air Force has released the notification for Agniveervayu Intake 02/2026 under the Agnipath Scheme. Eligible male and female candidates can apply online for the Agniveer Vayu post. The recruitment is open to candidates from both science and non-science backgrounds. Selection will be based on an online test, physical fitness test, and medical examination.

item.title: MPPSC Food Safety Officer Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: Madhya Pradesh Public Service Commission (MPPSC) has released a notification for the recruitment of Food Safety Officer (FSO) with a total of 67 vacancies. The application process will be conducted online, and the job location is Madhya Pradesh. Candidates from all over India are eligible to apply, but those from other states will be treated as General (UR) category and will not receive any reservation or fee relaxation. Applicants must hold a Bachelor’s, Master’s, or Ph.D. degree in Food Technology, Agriculture, Biotechnology, Chemistry, Veterinary Science, Medicine, or a related field, or possess an equivalent qualification recognized by the Central Government. The age limit is 21 to 40 years, with age relaxation applicable as per rules for reserved categories. For complete details and to apply, visit the official website mppsc.mp.gov.in.

item.title: Railway BLW Apprentices Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: Banaras Locomotive Works (BLW), Indian Railways, has released the official notification for the 47th Batch Act Apprentice Recruitment 2025. A total of 374 apprentice posts are available for both ITI and Non-ITI candidates. The trades include Fitter (137 posts), Carpenter (3), Painter (General) (7), Machinist (82), Welder (G&E) (56), and Electrician (89). For ITI posts, candidates must have passed Class 10th with at least 50% marks and hold an ITI certificate in the relevant trade from NCVT/SCVT. For Non-ITI posts, only 10th pass with 50% marks is required. The application process is completely online through the official website blw.indianrailways.gov.in. Interested candidates must apply before the last date as mentioned in the notification.

item.title: RSSB Lab Attendant Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Rajasthan Staff Selection Board (RSSB) has released the notification for Lab Attendant (Prayogshala Sahayak) Recruitment 2025. Eligible candidates can apply online through the official website. This recruitment is a great opportunity for 10th pass candidates seeking government jobs in Rajasthan. Applicants must have a valid domicile of Rajasthan to claim reservation benefits; candidates from other states can apply under the unreserved category (UR). The selection process will include a written examination followed by document verification. Interested candidates are advised to read the official notification carefully and apply before the last date.

item.title: Central Bank ZBO Exam Result 2025
item.description: Central Bank of India has officially released the Zone Based Officer (ZBO) Result 2025. Candidates who appeared for the exam can now check their results, download the merit list PDF, and verify their selection status. The result includes zone-wise shortlisted candidates based on written exam and interview performance. Visit the official website or use the direct link provided here to check your result, cutoff marks, and other important updates

item.title: Rajasthan HC Civil Judge Pre Admit Card 2025
item.description: The Rajasthan High Court has released the Admit Card for Civil Judge Prelims Exam 2025. Candidates can now download their hall ticket from the official website. The exam aims to recruit Civil Judges across Rajasthan. Admit card includes exam date, time, and venue details.

item.title: MP D.El.Ed Counselling 2025-26 | 3rd Round | Apply
SSC Combined Graduate Level Exam 2025- Correction/edit form 2025
Indian Army SSC Tech Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Indian Army has released the short notification for SSC Technical Entry 66th Course for Men and Women. A total of 379 vacancies are available, including 350 for men and 29 for women. The course will commence in April 2026 at Officers Training Academy (OTA), Chennai. Candidates with a Degree in Engineering (B.E. / B.Tech) in relevant disciplines are eligible to apply. The online application process will begin on 16 July 2025 and continue until 14 August 2025 through the official website joinindianarmy.nic.in. This is a great opportunity for aspiring engineers to join the Indian Army as Short Service Commission Officers.

item.title: SBI CBO 2025 Exam Date/ Admitcard
NTA CSIR NET June 2025 Exam Date Out
item.description: The National Testing Agency (NTA) has released the CSIR UGC NET June 2025 notification for Junior Research Fellowship (JRF) and Lectureship/Assistant Professor in various science subjects. Eligible candidates can apply online at csirnet.nta.nic.in. Check important dates, eligibility, syllabus, and exam pattern before applying.

item.title: CSBC Bihar Police Constable Admitcard Available 2025
item.description:
CSBC Bihar Police Constable Recruitment 2025

Central Selection Board of Constable CSBC

Short Details of Notification Bihar Police Advt No. : 01/2025

Important Dates

  • Application Begin: 18/03/2025
  • Last Date for Apply Online: 25/04/2025
  • Pay Exam Fee Last Date: 25/04/2025

  • Maximum Age: 25 Years.

item.title: Indian Coast Guard Assistant Commandant AC Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Indian Coast Guard has released the notification for Assistant Commandant Recruitment 2025. A total of 170 vacancies are available under two main branches: General Duty (GD) with 140 posts and Technical (Engineering/Electrical) with 30 posts. Eligible male candidates with a graduate degree and Physics & Maths at 10+2 level can apply for GD, while candidates with an engineering degree in relevant disciplines can apply for the Technical branch. The application process is online through the official website joinindiancoastguard.cdac.in. This is a prestigious Group ‚ÄòA‚Äô Gazetted Officer post under the Ministry of Defence, Government of India.

item.title: RPSC Research Assistant Admit Card 2025
item.description: The Rajasthan Public Service Commission (RPSC) has released the Research Assistant Admit Card 2025 on its official website. Candidates who have applied for the examination can now download their admit card by visiting rpsc.rajasthan.gov.in. The admit card contains important details such as exam date, time, center, and instructions. Candidates must carry a valid ID proof along with the admit card to the exam center.

item.title: RRB NTPC 10+2 Under Graduate Level Exam Date/ Application Status 2025
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has officially released the exam dates for the NTPC 10+2 (Under Graduate) level posts. The Computer Based Test (CBT 1) will be conducted from 7 August to 8 September 2025. Candidates who have applied for the RRB NTPC UG posts can check the detailed exam schedule on the official RRB websites. This exam is conducted for 12th-pass candidates applying for various undergraduate-level posts in Indian Railways.

item.title: BPSC Lower Division Clerk LDC Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) has released a notification for the recruitment of Lower Division Clerk (LDC) posts with a total of 26 vacancies. Candidates who have passed Intermediate (10+2) in any stream from a recognized board and possess computer operation and typing skills are eligible to apply. This recruitment is primarily for domicile candidates of Bihar, who will receive reservation benefits as per their category. Candidates from other states can also apply but will be considered under the General (Unreserved) category only, without any reservation or age relaxation. The application process is completely online. Out of the total posts, 13 are for General, 3 for EWS, 4 for SC, 1 for ST, 2 for EBC, 2 for BC, and 1 for BC Female.

item.title: JHC Jharkhand High Court Assistant Admit Card 2025
item.description: The Jharkhand High Court (JHC) has officially released the Assistant Admit Card 2025 for the upcoming recruitment examination. Candidates who applied for the post of Assistant can now download their hall ticket from the official website jhc.org.in. The examination is scheduled to be held on 20th July 2025. The admit card contains important details such as exam date, time, venue, and candidate information. It is mandatory to carry a printed copy of the admit card along with a valid photo ID to the examination center.

item.title: IOB Local Bank Officer 2025 Admit Card Donwnload
DSSSB 2025: Apply for Various Posts
item.description: DSSSB Various Post Recruitment 2025 has been announced for multiple vacancies in different departments under the Delhi Government, including posts like Malaria Inspector, Ayurvedic Pharmacist, PGT Teachers, Warder, Technician, and Laboratory Assistant. The minimum qualification ranges from Class 10th pass to Master‚Äôs degree, with specific experience and course requirements depending on the post. Eligible candidates from any state in India can apply online through dsssbonline.nic.in from 8th July 2025 to 7th August 2025. The job postings will be within Delhi only. The exam dates and admit cards will be released as per schedule, so applicants should read the official notification carefully and submit their applications before the last date.

MPTRANSCO Various Post Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: Madhya Pradesh Power Transmission Company Limited (MPPTCL) has released a recruitment notification for 633 regular posts under the 2025‚Äì26 session. This recruitment is open only to the permanent residents of Madhya Pradesh. The available positions include Assistant Engineer (Transmission), Law Officer, Junior Engineer (Transmission and Civil), Line Attendant, and Substation Attendant. The application process is completely online, and the last date to apply is 4th August 2025. The selection will be based on a written examination followed by document verification. Educational qualifications, reservation rules, and other eligibility criteria will follow the Madhya Pradesh government norms. For detailed information and online application, candidates can visit the official website: www.mptransco.in.

item.title: MP ITI Counseling 2025-26: Choice Filling
Bihar Vidhan Sabha Security Guard Admit Card 2025
item.description: The Bihar Vidhan Sabha has released the admit card for the Security Guard Recruitment Exam 2025. Candidates can download the hall ticket from the official website to check their exam date, time, and center details.

item.title: Bihar Home Guard Result Declared 2025
item.description:
Bihar Home Guard Recruitment 2025

Bihar Home Guard Department

Short Details of Notification Bihar HG Advt No. : 01/2025

Important Dates

  • Application Begin: 27/03/2025
  • Last Date for Apply Online: 16/04/2025
  • Pay Exam Fee Last Date: 16/04/2025
  • Exam Date: 30/04/2025 to 05/06/2025
  • Admit Card Available: 24/04/2025
  • Result Available: 04/07/2025

Application Fee

  • General / OBC / EWS: 200/-
  • SC / ST: 100/-
  • All Category Female: 100/-

  • Pay the Examination Fee Through Debit Card, Credit Card, Net Banking or Pay Offline Fee Payment Through E Challan Mode Only

  • Age Limit as on 01/01/2025

Age relaxation as per rules of Bihar HG Advt No. : 01/2025.

item.title: Indian Navy Civilian INCET Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Indian Navy has released the INCET 01/2025 notification for the recruitment of 1097 civilian posts under Group B and Group C categories across various naval commands. Eligible candidates can apply online through the official website for posts like Chargeman, Tradesman Mate, Fireman, Pharmacist, Storekeeper, MTS, and more. The selection process includes a written exam and document verification. Applicants must check post-wise qualifications, age limits, and category-wise vacancies before applying.

item.title: JPSC Assistant Public Prosecutor APO Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: Jharkhand Public Service Commission (JPSC) has released the notification for 134 vacancies of Assistant Public Prosecutor (APO) for the year 2025. Candidates holding a Bachelor‚Äôs Degree in Law (LLB) from any recognized university in India are eligible to apply. The selection process will include written examinations and interviews. Interested candidates can apply online within the specified application dates. Category-wise vacancies are available for UR, BC-I, BC-II, EWS, SC, and ST candidates. For complete eligibility criteria and application details, refer to the official notification.

item.title: MP Anganwadi Worker & Helper WCD 2025 Online Correction
BTSC Bihar Nursing Tutor Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Bihar Technical Service Commission (BTSC) has released a notification for the recruitment of 498 Nursing Tutors under the Health Department, Government of Bihar. Candidates holding M.Sc Nursing, B.Sc Nursing (Basic/Post Basic), or a Diploma in Nursing Education & Administration (DNEA) are eligible to apply. The selection process includes eligibility verification and document scrutiny as per INC and Bihar Nursing Council norms. 35% of the vacancies are reserved for female candidates. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the official BTSC website within the given time frame.

item.title: Bihar PCS 71st Online Form 2025 | Exam date Out
NTA CUET UG Result 2025
item.description: The National Testing Agency (NTA) has officially declared the CUET UG 2025 results. Candidates who appeared for the Common University Entrance Test can now check their scorecards on the official website ‚Äì cuet.samarth.ac.in. The result includes detailed marks, percentiles, and overall performance. Students need their application number and date of birth to log in and view the result. Based on the scores, universities will proceed with their admission processes.

item.title: BOB Local Bank Officers LBO Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: Bank of Baroda (BOB) has announced 2500 vacancies for the post of Local Bank Officer (JMG/S-I) across multiple states. Candidates must hold a graduation degree in any discipline from a recognized university. Professional qualifications like CA, Engineering, or Medical are also accepted. Applicants must have at least 1 year of experience as an officer in a Scheduled Commercial Bank or Regional Rural Bank listed under the Second Schedule of the RBI. Experience in NBFCs, cooperative banks, and fintechs will not be considered. The recruitment is open state-wise with preference for candidates familiar with the local language.

item.title: RPSC Various Vacancy Admit Card 2025
item.description: Rajasthan Public Service Commission (RPSC) has released the admit card for various posts under its 2025 recruitment drive. Candidates can now download their hall tickets from the official RPSC website. The admit card includes important details such as exam date, time, venue, and candidate information. All applicants must carry a printed copy of the admit card along with a valid ID proof to the examination center.

item.title: IBPS Hindi Officer Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Institute of Banking Personnel Selection (IBPS) has released the notification for Hindi Officer (Rajbhasha Adhikari) Recruitment 2025 under Specialist Officer (SO) cadre. Eligible candidates with a Master‚Äôs degree in Hindi or English with the relevant language combination can apply online through the official IBPS website. The application process includes registration, form filling, and fee payment. Applicants are expected to have desirable translation experience in a banking or financial institution and proficiency in MS Word and Excel. The online registration, eligibility criteria, important dates, and complete details are available in the official notification. Interested candidates are advised to apply within the given timeline.

item.title: Indian Navy Agniveer MR Musician Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Indian Navy has invited online applications for the post of Agniveer MR Musician 2025. Candidates must have passed Class 10 (Matric) with at least 50% marks and possess musical ability as specified in the official notification. The physical fitness test includes a 1.6 km run, squats (uthak baithak), push-ups, and bent knee sit-ups with separate benchmarks for male and female candidates. Interested aspirants are advised to check the complete eligibility criteria before applying.

item.title: UPPSC Computer Assistant Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Uttar Pradesh Public Service Commission (UPPSC) has released a notification for the recruitment of Computer Assistant posts in 2025. A total of 13 vacancies have been announced for eligible male and female candidates across India. To apply, candidates must have passed 10+2 (Intermediate) along with either a valid ‚ÄúO‚Äù Level certificate from NIELIT or a Diploma in Computer Science. The minimum age required is 18 years, and selected candidates will receive an initial salary in the ‚Çπ25,500 ‚Äì ‚Çπ81,100 pay scale (Level-4). The application process is online only and will be available soon on the official website uppsc.up.nic.in. Interested candidates are advised to regularly check the website for the release of the online form and notification.

item.title: PFRDA Assistant Manager AM Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Pension Fund Regulatory and Development Authority (PFRDA) has released the notification for the recruitment of 40 Assistant Manager (Grade A) posts in various streams including General, Finance, IT, Research, Legal, Actuary, and Official Language. Eligible candidates with qualifications such as Master‚Äôs Degree, BE/B.Tech, LLB, or Chartered Accountancy can apply online. The selection process includes online exams and interviews. item.title: SSC Junior Engineer JE Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has released the notification for the Junior Engineer (JE) Recruitment 2025. The vacancies are available in various departments such as BRO, CPWD, CWC, MES, NTRO, and others for trades including Civil, Electrical, and Mechanical. Candidates must have a Diploma or Degree in the relevant engineering discipline. Some departments also require two years of work experience. The application process is completely online, and the selection will be based on a Computer-Based Test (Paper 1), Paper 2, and Document Verification. This recruitment is open to both male and female candidates across India. Interested applicants can visit the official SSC website https://ssc.gov.in for more details and to apply online.

item.description: The Institute of Banking Personnel Selection (IBPS) has released the notification for the Specialist Officer (SO) CRP SPL-XV Recruitment 2025. A total of 1007 vacancies have been announced for various Scale I posts including IT Officer, Agriculture Field Officer (AFO), Rajbhasha Adhikari, Law Officer, HR/Personnel Officer, and Marketing Officer. The online application process will be open from 1st July 2025 to 21st July 2025. The Preliminary Examination is scheduled for August 2025, followed by the Main Examination in November 2025. Interviews are likely to be conducted in January/February 2026. Applications will be accepted in online mode only. For more details and to apply, visit the official website www.ibps.in.

item.description: Chhattisgarh Professional Examination Board (CG Vyapam) has released the MLV125 Recruitment 2025 notification for various Group D posts under the Department of Printing and Stationery, Raipur. Applicants must ensure to review the official notification carefully and complete the form, including uploading documents and paying the fee online. The written exam is tentatively scheduled for 31 August 2025 at district centers like Raipur, Durg, and Bilaspur.

item.title: Rajasthan HC Driver Recruitment 2025 Online Form
item.description: Rajasthan High Court has officially released the notification for Driver Recruitment 2025, inviting applications for a total of 58 vacancies. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the official website hcraj.nic.in from 18 June to 7 July 2025. This recruitment drive offers a great opportunity for candidates seeking government jobs in the driving sector under the Rajasthan judiciary. Applicants are advised to carefully read the eligibility criteria, application process, and important dates mentioned in the official notification before applying.

Admit cards for other categories like Tradesmen, Technical, and Clerk/SKT will be available from June 18.

CG Abkari Aarakshak Bharti 2025 Online Form
item.description: CG Abkari Aarakshak Bharti 2025 invites applications for 200 Excise Constable posts. Eligible candidates who have passed 12th can apply online from June 4 to June 27, 2025. The written exam will be held on July 27, 2025. Applicants from all Indian states can apply, but only Chhattisgarh residents will receive reservation and age relaxation benefits. The recruitment will be conducted by CG Vyapam, and the selection process includes a written test and physical eligibility test.

  • Maximum Age: 30 Years.

üì¢ ‡§Ü‡§µ‡•á‡§¶‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ
  • üëâ ‡§Ü‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï ‡§µ‡•á‡§¨‡§∏‡§æ‡§á‡§ü ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç‡•§

item.title: How to Self-Link DBT with NPCI? ‚Äì Easy Online & Offline Methods
item.description:
NPCI ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§Ø‡§Ç DBT ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ï ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç? ‚Äì ‡§ë‡§®‡§≤‡§æ‡§á‡§® ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ë‡§´‡§≤‡§æ‡§á‡§® ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡§æ

How to Self-Link DBT with NPCI? ‚Äì Easy Online & Offline Methods

üì¢ NPCI ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡•à ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•á‡•§
  • NPCI (‡§®‡•á‡§∂‡§®‡§≤ ‡§™‡•á‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•â‡§∞‡§™‡•ã‡§∞‡•á‡§∂‡§® ‡§ë‡§´ ‡§á‡§Ç‡§°‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ) ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§°‡§æ‡§Ø‡§∞‡•á‡§ï‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡•á‡§®‡§ø‡§´‡§ø‡§ü ‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ç‡§∏‡§´‡§∞ (DBT) ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§≠ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è, ‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§¨‡•à‡§Ç‡§ï ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ü‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡§Ç‡§¨‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ï ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï ‡§π‡•à‡•§ ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ë‡§®‡§≤‡§æ‡§á‡§® ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ë‡§´‡§≤‡§æ‡§á‡§® ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§
üì¢ ‡§ë‡§®‡§≤‡§æ‡§á‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ: ‡§á‡§Ç‡§ü‡§∞‡§®‡•á‡§ü ‡§¨‡•à‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á:
  • NPCI ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ë‡§´‡§ø‡§∏‡§ø‡§Ø‡§≤ Website ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§Ø‡•á‡§Ç
  • "Consumer" ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç
  • Bharat Aadhaar Seeding Enabler (BASE) ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç ‡•§
  • Aadhaar Seeding/Deseeding ‡§ü‡•á‡§™ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á
  • ‡§Ü‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¨‡§ß‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§≠‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§¨‡§Æ‡§ø‡§ü ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡•§
  • (‡§Ö‡§•‡§µ‡§æ)
  • ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§¨‡•à‡§Ç‡§ï ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§á‡§Ç‡§ü‡§∞‡§®‡•á‡§ü ‡§¨‡•à‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≤‡•â‡§ó‡§ø‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡•§
  • '‡§Ü‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§°‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó' ‡§Ø‡§æ '‡§Ü‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó' ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™ ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•á‡§Ç‡•§
  • ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡§Ç‡§¨‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§ú ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï ‡§µ‡§ø‡§µ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§≠‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡•§
  • ‡§∏‡§¨‡§Æ‡§ø‡§ü ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶, ‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§Ç‡§ú‡•Ä‡§ï‡•É‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•ã‡§¨‡§æ‡§á‡§≤ ‡§®‡§Ç‡§¨‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ì‡§ü‡•Ä‡§™‡•Ä (OTP) ‡§Ü‡§è‡§ó‡§æ‡•§
  • ‡§ì‡§ü‡•Ä‡§™‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§ú ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡•§
üì¢ ‡§Æ‡•ã‡§¨‡§æ‡§á‡§≤ ‡§¨‡•à‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§ê‡§™ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á:
  • ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§¨‡•à‡§Ç‡§ï ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ü‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Æ‡•ã‡§¨‡§æ‡§á‡§≤ ‡§ê‡§™ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≤‡•â‡§ó‡§ø‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡•§
  • '‡§Ü‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó' ‡§Ø‡§æ '‡§Ü‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§°‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó' ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç‡•§
  • ‡§Ü‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡§Ç‡§¨‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§ú ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï ‡§µ‡§ø‡§µ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§≠‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡•§
  • ‡§ì‡§ü‡•Ä‡§™‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§™‡§® ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡•§
üì¢ ‡§ë‡§´‡§≤‡§æ‡§á‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ: ‡§¨‡•à‡§Ç‡§ï ‡§∂‡§æ‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§æ‡§ï‡§∞:

item.title: Union Bank of India Apprentices Online Form 2025
item.description:
Union Bank Apprentice Recruitment 2025

Union Bank of India (UBI)

Short Details of Notification UBI Apprentices Exam 2025

Important Dates

  • Application Begin: 19/02/2025
  • Last Date for Apply Online: 05/03/2025
  • Complete Form Last Date: 05/03/2025
  • Exam Date: As per Schedule
  • Admit Card Available: Before Exam

Application Fee

  • General / OBC / EWS : 800/-
  • SC / ST : 600/-
  • PH (Divyang) : 400/-
  • All Category Female : 600/-
  • Pay the Exam Fees Through Debit Card / Credit Card / Net Banking Only.

Eligibility

  • Age Limit as on 01/02/2025

  • Minimum Age: 20 Years.
  • Maximum Age: 28 Years.

Age relaxation as per rules of UBI Apprentices Exam 2025.

item.title: Promotion or Ads on Whatsapp Channel Terms
item.description:
Terms & Conditions for WhatsApp Promotion

1. Posting Duration:

The post/link you provide will be shared on our channel for a fixed duration of 24-48 hours only.

2. Right to Update New Posts:

30 minutes after your post or link is shared, we reserve the right to update new posts on our channel.

3. Post Removal:

Once the specified duration ends, your post/link will be removed from our channel.

üì¢ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§à‡§°‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞:
  • ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§à‡§°‡•Ä ‚Äì ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•á ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§è‡§ï 8 ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§à‡§°‡•Ä‡•§

üì¢ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§à‡§°‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç?

üì¢ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞ e-KYC ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à?

  • ‚úÖ ‡§∏‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§≠ ‚Äì e-KYC ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∞‡§æ‡§∂‡§® ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§°, ‡§õ‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§µ‡•É‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§ø, ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ú‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡•Å‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§™‡•á‡§Ç‡§∂‡§®, ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§®‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§£ ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§® ‡§∏‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§≠ ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§
  • ‚úÖ ‡§Ü‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ï ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡§æ ‚Äì ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞ e-KYC ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡§∞‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§à‡§°‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ü‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡§Ç‡§¨‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à, ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§∏‡•á ‡§´‡§∞‡•ç‡§ú‡•Ä‡§µ‡§æ‡§°‡§º‡•á ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∞‡•ã‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡•á‡•§
  • ‚úÖ ‡§°‡§ø‡§ú‡§ø‡§ü‡§≤ ‡§∏‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§™‡§® ‚Äì e-KYC ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡§∞‡§ø‡§è ‡§¨‡§ø‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ‡§ó‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á ‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§∞‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ë‡§®‡§≤‡§æ‡§á‡§® ‡§∏‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§™‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§

üì¢ ‡§ë‡§®‡§≤‡§æ‡§á‡§® ‡§®‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∏‡§¶‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ú‡•ã‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ:

  • 2Ô∏è‚É£ "‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§à‡§°‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡•á‡§Ç" ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§à‡§°‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§ú ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡•§
  • 3Ô∏è‚É£ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ç‡§ö‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∏‡§¨‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡•Ä‡§ö‡•á "‡§®‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∏‡§¶‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ú‡•ã‡§°‡§º‡•á‡§Ç" ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™ ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡•á‡§ó‡§æ, ‡§â‡§∏ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡•§
  • 4Ô∏è‚É£ ‡§®‡§è ‡§∏‡§¶‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ, ‡§ú‡§®‡•ç‡§Æ ‡§§‡§ø‡§•‡§ø, ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó, ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ-‡§™‡§ø‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ, ‡§Ü‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡§Ç‡§¨‡§∞ (‡§Ø‡§¶‡§ø ‡§â‡§™‡§≤‡§¨‡•ç‡§ß ‡§π‡•ã) ‡§≠‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡•§
  • 5Ô∏è‚É£ ‡§ú‡§∞‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§µ‡•á‡§ú‡§º (‡§ú‡§®‡•ç‡§Æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§£ ‡§™‡§§‡•ç‡§∞, ‡§µ‡§ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§π ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§£ ‡§™‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§¶‡§ø) ‡§Ö‡§™‡§≤‡•ã‡§° ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡•§

  • üí° ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§® ‡§¶‡•á‡§Ç: ‡§®‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∏‡§¶‡§∏‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ú‡•ã‡§°‡§º‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è OTP ‡§∏‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§™‡§® ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§®‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§æ‡§∏‡§® ‡§∏‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§Æ‡•ã‡§¶‡§® (Approval) ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§

item.title: Apaar Id Card Download and Apaar Consent Pdf Form
item.description:
Apaar ID Card Download

The APAAR ID card, also known as the One Nation One Student ID, is a unique 12-digit identification number for students in India. It's designed to digitally store and manage all academic credits, including scorecards, mark sheets, degrees, diplomas, and certificates.

üì¢ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø:

  • ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§® ‡§ú‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§ø ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ï ‡§≠‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡•Ä, ‡§™‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§≠‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡•Ä, ‡§µ‡§® ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó, ‡§™‡§ü‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä, ‡§®‡§∞‡•ç‡§∏‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó, ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§§‡§ï‡§®‡•Ä‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§§‡§•‡§æ ‡§ó‡•à‡§∞-‡§§‡§ï‡§®‡•Ä‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§¶‡•§

üì¢ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ñ ‡§™‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç:

üì¢ ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§™‡§Æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§´‡§æ‡§á‡§≤ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï ‡§¶‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§µ‡•á‡§ú‡§º

  • ‡§π‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§∞ (Signature)

  • ‡§¶‡§ø‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡§æ‡§£ ‡§™‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ (Disability Certificate)
üì¢MPESB (‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡•á‡§∂ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ö‡§Ø‡§® ‡§¨‡•ã‡§∞‡•ç‡§°) ‡§™‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä

1. ‡§≠‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç (Recruitment Exams)

(a) ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Å‡§™-1 ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Å‡§™-2 ‡§≠‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡•Ä

  • ‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§æ‡§∏‡§®‡§ø‡§ï ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§§‡§ï‡§®‡•Ä‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§™‡§¶‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è‡•§
  • ‡§â‡§¶‡§æ‡§π‡§∞‡§£: ‡§∏‡§π‡§æ‡§Ø‡§ï ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß‡§ï, ‡§ï‡§®‡§ø‡§∑‡•ç‡§† ‡§Ö‡§≠‡§ø‡§Ø‡§Ç‡§§‡§æ, ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§£ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä‡•§

(b) ‡§™‡§ü‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§≠‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ

  • ‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡§ü‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§™‡§¶‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è‡•§
  • ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§£ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§æ‡§∏‡§® ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•Ç‡§Æ‡§ø ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß‡§® ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡•Å‡§°‡§º‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡•ç‡§® ‡§™‡•Ç‡§õ‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§

(c) ‡§™‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§≠‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ

  • ‡§™‡§¶: ‡§™‡•Å‡§≤‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Ç‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•á‡§¨‡§≤, ‡§∏‡§¨-‡§á‡§Ç‡§∏‡•ç‡§™‡•á‡§ï‡•ç‡§ü‡§∞ (SI), ‡§∞‡•á‡§°‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã ‡§ë‡§™‡§∞‡•á‡§ü‡§∞, ‡§°‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§á‡§µ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Ç‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•á‡§¨‡§≤‡•§
  • ‡§´‡§ø‡§ú‡§ø‡§ï‡§≤ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ñ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§™‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§∂‡§æ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§

(d) ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ï ‡§™‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ (TET)

  • ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§•‡§Æ‡§ø‡§ï ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§ø‡§ï ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ï ‡§™‡§¶‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è‡•§
  • ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ó-1, ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ó-2 ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ó-3 ‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§™‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§æ ‡§™‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ‡•§

(e) ‡§µ‡§® ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó ‡§™‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ

  • ‡§™‡§¶: ‡§´‡•â‡§∞‡•á‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü ‡§ó‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§°, ‡§´‡•â‡§∞‡•á‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü ‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡§ú‡§∞, ‡§°‡§ø‡§™‡•ç‡§ü‡•Ä ‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡§ú‡§∞‡•§

(f) ‡§®‡§∞‡•ç‡§∏‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ö‡§ø‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§≠‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡•Ä

  • ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡§æ‡§´ ‡§®‡§∞‡•ç‡§∏, ‡§≤‡•à‡§¨ ‡§§‡§ï‡§®‡•Ä‡§∂‡§ø‡§Ø‡§®, ‡§´‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü, ‡§ö‡§ø‡§ï‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä‡•§

(g) ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§£ ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡§ø ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§Ö‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä (RAEO)

2. ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§µ‡•á‡§∂ ‡§™‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç (Entrance Exams)

(a) ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä-‡§è‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§ö‡§∞ ‡§ü‡•á‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü (PAT)

  • ‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡§ø ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß‡§ø‡§§ ‡§™‡§æ‡§†‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§µ‡•á‡§∂‡•§

Important Dates

  • Application Begin : 01/01/2025
  • Last Date : 31/01/2025
  • Pay Exam Fee Last Date : 31/01/2025

  • Admit Card Available : Before Exam

  • SC / ST / PH / Female : 0/-

  • Maximum Age : 30 Years for Superintendent
  • Maximum Age : 27 Years for Junior Assistant
